about_the_game:
Welcome to Legends of the Eternal Flame - an exciting 2D platformer where you must embark on a perilous journey to rekindle the Eternal Flame and save the world on the brink of chaos. As Lapalapa, one of the Children of the Eternal Flame, it is your mission to collect the flames and face six bizarre worlds filled with obstacles that will test your skills to the limit.



Throughout the game, you will encounter increasingly difficult challenges that will require quick reflexes to overcome. From dodging deadly traps to blasting yourself into the sky using a cannon, you will need to master a variety of skills to progress through the game and reach your ultimate goal of restoring balance to the world.



The game boasts a unique graphic style that brings the worlds to life, and a captivating soundtrack that immerses you in the adventure.
With its challenging gameplay, this platformer game is an epic adventure that will keep you hooked until the very end. Get ready for a thrilling ride as you take on the role of Lapalapa and set out to save the world from chaos!
